p: Comparison of the means showed that the 20–80 min DT EO fraction from ground material had the highest antimicrobial activity against EF, SP, and PA ( Table 8). The highest activity against YE was demonstrated at the 20–80 min EO fraction from the nonground material, the highest activity against CA and CK was found in the 0–5 min EO fraction from the nonground material, and the highest activity against CT was found with the use of the 5–10 min DT EO fraction from ground material ( Table 8).
